rooms.description: Open space combining living and dining, with large windows to the courtyard.
Modern kitchen integrated with dining area. Vastu principles ensure south-east facing entrance for positive energy.
Dedicated library space located in a quiet corner near the central courtyard to enhance natural light and ventilation.
Cozy guest bedroom with attached small balcony for view of the courtyard.
Modern bathroom adjoining living space and designed following Vastu guidelines to avoid water stagnation.
Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining ensuite bathroom and a private balcony overlooking the courtyard.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity, positioned near the central courtyard for natural light.
